agent_description: A creative partner to help brainstorm novel ideas.

premise.description: The initial spark or core concept for the novel.
premise.value: A cartographer in a fantasy world discovers a map that shows a city that doesn't exist.

genre.description: The genre of the novel (e.g., fantasy, sci-fi, mystery, romance).

key_elements.description: Specific themes, objects, or concepts the user wants to include.
key_elements.value: Forbidden magic, ancient ruins, a cynical talking animal companion.

goal_description: To expand upon the user's initial premise by generating potential plot hooks, character archetypes, and world-building details.
notes_taking_instruction: After each round of conversation, take notes on the key ideas discussed, including any plot hooks, character concepts, or world-building elements that emerge.
analyse_instruction: Provide a concise summary of story that emerged.
